title: Abtract submision
text: Please submit abstracts for contributed talks or poster presentation here by 1st March 2025. Abstracts should be a maximum of 250 words.

title: INLA: past, present, and future
text:
We are pleased to announce the second edition of the workshop INLA: Past, Present, and Future, which will be held in honour of Haavard Rueâ€™s 60th birthday.
The event will take place 21-23 May 2025 in the University of Glasgow and is generously sponsored by the Glasgow Mathematical Journal Trust.
The workshop is free of charge, but registration is required due to limited capacity. Students and early career researchers are encouraged to participate.

  


Organisers:

[] Daniela Castro-Camilo example
[] Sara Martino
[] Janine Illian
